title: PBE
body: Hello, I'm from Brazil, I do not have a very high link. I'm currently in gold IV (4) I'm not rage, I play normally, I've never taken any punishment or anything. I'd like a PBE account to see the new champions and see the news , Buffs, nerfs and etc ... I would like to know if it would be possible ..

replies.body: Hey there!  You sound like an awesome player but I don't have any details on how candidates are picked beyond the[ PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).  The PBE page is currently down for maintenance, but once it's up you can definitely[ sign up](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe) though I can't make any guarantees.  Good luck with your pplication!
